website_summaries.verdict: The soft texture and mineral ingredients work well for many consumers, but it may not work for you if you have crepey skin or large pores.
pros: A mineral-based powder that's made with skin-nourishing vitamins
Absorbs oil and sets other makeup products with a lightweight finish
Made without phthalates, parabens, and sulfates
Four shades are suitable for most skin tones
cons: Some reports of breakouts after using it
Has the tendency to emphasize lines and pores

customer_reviews.title: It rocks at keeping my skin flawless!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome powder!! It smooths on evenly and provides great coverage. I am very happy I found this product. It does not breakdown, become greasy or flaky. It hides those pesky wrinkles pretty darn good!!
customer_reviews.author: Sungirl

customer_reviews.title: made me a little oily which is strange. it's ...
customer_reviews.text: made me a little oily which is strange. it's a little darker than just medium but matched me well despite that fact.
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but doesn't last very long. I noticed I start getting oily after 3 to 4 hours and I don't usually get oily.
customer_reviews.author: Mephysa

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. Not a full coverage but helps to reduce shine.
customer_reviews.author: cstephens

customer_reviews.title: Good recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I can recommend this one this product because this is a very nice in your face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I think is fake. In the back say made ...
customer_reviews.text: I think is fake. In the back say made in China. Is not the same presentation in the picture that I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Palacios

customer_reviews.title: I would of liked more coverage
customer_reviews.text: I expected so much more from this powder. It isn't smooth, it's a little dry when you put it on. I would of liked more coverage. Sadly disappointed but knowing it's not terrible for my skin, I will live with at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Wrong shade - matches neither the box it came in or the online order I placed
customer_reviews.text: The wrong shade was shipped!!! The order was for medium, the box it came in said medium -- but the shade of the actual compact is light (consistent with label on underside of compact which I did not check below). And regretfully I threw the box away immediately since I check it against the order. Other than that -- I LOVE the Tarte compact. Great, long lasting coverage. While not cheap - one compact goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: This powder has become one of my favorite products. Definitely recommend and Amazonian Clay product by ...
customer_reviews.text: This powder has become one of my favorite products. Definitely recommend and Amazonian Clay product by Tarte for people with oily skin. This product really leaves a full to medium coverage ad lasts all day :)
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Garcia

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It helps with my oily skin and makes my face looking so soft and flawless. I am a repeat customer on this product. The only thing when I ordered this specific one, it seems to dark for my pale complexion. I need to go lighter.
customer_reviews.author: darcy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty opaque coverage
customer_reviews.text: Carry this around in my purse to use as a "touch up" throughout the day. Pretty opaque coverage, so I use it as a quick fix when I don't have time to put on foundation, loose powder, concealer etc. Also use as a setting powder on top of my makeup when I have the time to apply a full face of makeup. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DMO

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Tarte product!
customer_reviews.text: Color was perfect, and much cheaper than ordering from the Tarte website. I am in love with their makeup, and while it's usually cheaper to order directly from them, this wasnt one of those times. This is a real Tarte product!
customer_reviews.author: ReneeRTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and this product gave me no reaction. It was a little dark but I wear it in the summer and it looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: susans

customer_reviews.title: Love this. For the price and ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love this. For the price and ease of use, it is definitely a go to throughout the day when I'm feeling shiny or need a quick fix.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I started breaking out as soon as I started using it. :(
customer_reviews.author: luisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like Tarte cosmetics very much. Doesn't irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Nekochan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY SMOOTH AND EASY TO APPLY WITH LONG LASTING POWER.
customer_reviews.author: Keyome Palomares

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love tarte! This stuff is great for my sensitive skin. Lasts a long time. WORTH
customer_reviews.author: Kbizzle

product_meta.title: Tarte Smooth Operator Amazonian Clay Tinted Pressed Finishing Powder, Medium, 0.39 Ounce
product_meta.description: A silky, weightless, buildable and talc-free finishing powder. Formulated with Amazonian clay to control oil and shine. Contains Vitamins A, C and E to protect and replenish skin. Infused with mineral pigments to soothe and soften skin. Provides sheer matte coverage to set the complexion. Blurs the look of pores and imperfections with no flaking. Leaves skin fresh and healthy looking.
feature_bullets: A silky, weightless, buildable and talc-free finishing powder
Formulated with Amazonian clay to control oil and shine
Contains Vitamins A, C and E to protect and replenish skin
